body_html: I think this would be better addressed by adding a note to the documentation of atrous_conv2d explaining that it is a legacy interface and that tf.nn.convolution can be used for atrous convolutions of any number of dimensions, rather than adding additional redundant functions.
body_text: I think this would be better addressed by adding a note to the documentation of atrous_conv2d explaining that it is a legacy interface and that tf.nn.convolution can be used for atrous convolutions of any number of dimensions, rather than adding additional redundant functions.
